# 2025 ESPY Awards

| location = Dolby Theatre, Los Angeles
| country =
| host = Shane Gillis

The 2025 ESPY Awards, the 33rd annual ceremony of the ESPY Awards, took place on July 16, 2025, at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, and broadcast by ABC.
Ceremony information
Comedian Shane Gillis hosted the ceremony.

;Jimmy V Award
* Katie Schumacher-Cawley
;Arthur Ashe Courage Award
